    • About Me

    I started my web development journey two years ago while watching a video on HTML and CSS out of curiosity. Over time I grew my skills through intrigue and alot of hard work. I get quite happy when I can think of a cool idea and be able to make it a reality in code. As someone that always enjoyed building as a kid and teenager, coding continues to satisfy this craving for me.
